attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforcement officers are persisting with Dawn Raids, even to families with young children. This contravenes both UN Declaration of the  rights of children and our 'own' Every Child Matters.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
